Our day trip to Mars offers a unique opportunity to explore the Martian landscape, visit some of its most interesting places and get a glimpse of what it could be like to live on this planet.

So, if you're ready for the adventure of a lifetime and want to experience the Red Planet in just one day, join us on "A Day Trip to Mars" and be part of a select group of people who can say they have visited Mars!

practicalInfo.en:
Welcome to Stauning Whisky, the distillery that defies expectations. As soon as you step inside, you'll be struck by the modern Danish design and the rustic splendor of the past. Our distillery is truly one-of-a-kind, boasting 24 copper pot stills that are unlike anything you've ever seen before.

Join us for our Tour of Stauning Whisky, where you'll get to go behind the scenes and see how we transform locally grown cereal into some of the world's finest whisky. Our guided tour takes you through the entire process, from the mash tun to the fermentation tanks all the way to the final product. Along the way, you'll learn about the history of Stauning and how our distillery stands out from the rest. And of course, no tour of Stauning Whisky would be complete without a tasting of our award-winning whisky. Whether you're a whisky enthusiast or a first-time drinker, our tour is family-friendly and promises an experience that's both fascinating and memorable.

practicalInfo.en:
The "Stockholm Culinary Delight Tour" is a gastronomic journey designed to tantalize the taste buds while exploring the rich culinary heritage of Stockholm. This delightful food walk takes participants through the bustling streets and quaint alleys of Stockholm, stopping at a handpicked selection of bars and restaurants. Each stop showcases the local flavors and traditional dishes of Sweden, providing an authentic taste of the city's diverse food scene.

Participants will experience a blend of historical insights and modern culinary trends, making this tour not just a feast for the palate but also a learning journey about Stockholm's food culture. The tour is designed to cater to all food enthusiasts, whether you're a seasoned foodie or simply someone who enjoys exploring new tastes and experiences.

practicalInfo.en:
The "Stockholm Culinary Delight Tour" is a gastronomic journey designed to tantalize the taste buds while exploring the rich culinary heritage of Stockholm. This delightful food walk takes participants through the bustling streets and quaint alleys of Stockholm, stopping at a handpicked selection of bars and restaurants. Each stop showcases the local flavors and traditional dishes of Sweden, providing an authentic taste of the city's diverse food scene.

Participants will experience a blend of historical insights and modern culinary trends, making this tour not just a feast for the palate but also a learning journey about Stockholm's food culture. The tour is designed to cater to all food enthusiasts, whether you're a seasoned foodie or simply someone who enjoys exploring new tastes and experiences.

practicalInfo.en:
Harry Houdini was a legendary magician and escape artist, known for his incredible stunts and daring feats of illusion. So it's only fitting that an escape room designed by him would be full of challenges and surprises.

As soon as you enter the room, you are transported back in time to the height of Houdini's career. The decor is ornate and opulent, with rich velvet curtains and antique furnishings. But it's not long before you realize that this is no ordinary room. Houdini has left a series of puzzles and traps for you to solve, each one more challenging than the last.

You must use your wits and your ingenuity to unravel the secrets of the escape room. You'll have to search for hidden clues and solve complex riddles to unlock each new challenge. As you progress, you'll encounter a variety of obstacles, including locked doors, intricate mechanisms, and hidden compartments.

But don't worry - Houdini has left you some helpful hints along the way. If you're clever enough to decipher his clues, you'll be able to unlock the final challenge and escape the room.

Will you be able to outsmart Houdini and escape his legendary escape room? There's only one way to find out!

practicalInfo.en:
Harry Houdini was a legendary magician and escape artist, known for his incredible stunts and daring exploits of illusion. So it is only fitting that an escape room designed by him would be filled with challenges and surprises.

As soon as you step into the room, you are transported back in time to the pinnacle of Houdini's career. The decor is ornate and opulent with rich velvet curtains and antique furniture. But it won't be long before you realize that this is not an ordinary room. Houdini has left behind a series of puzzles and traps for you to solve, each one more challenging than the last.

You need to use your wits and ingenuity to unravel the secrets of the escape space. You will need to search for hidden clues and solve complex puzzles to unlock each new challenge. As you progress, you will encounter a number of obstacles, including locked doors, intricate mechanisms and hidden spaces.

But don't worry â Houdini has left you some useful tips along the way. If you're smart enough to decipher his lead, you'll be able to unlock the final challenge and escape space.

Will you be able to outwit Houdini and escape his legendary escape room? There is only one way to find out!

practicalInfo.en:
Harry Houdini was a legendary magician and escape artist, known for his incredible stunts and daring feats of illusion. So it's only fitting that an escape room designed by him would be full of challenges and surprises.

As soon as you enter the room, you are transported back in time to the height of Houdini's career. The decor is ornate and opulent, with rich velvet curtains and antique furnishings. But it's not long before you realize that this is no ordinary room. Houdini has left a series of puzzles and traps for you to solve, each one more challenging than the last.

You must use your wits and your ingenuity to unravel the secrets of the escape room. You'll have to search for hidden clues and solve complex riddles to unlock each new challenge. As you progress, you'll encounter a variety of obstacles, including locked doors, intricate mechanisms, and hidden compartments.

But don't worry - Houdini has left you some helpful hints along the way. If you're clever enough to decipher his clues, you'll be able to unlock the final challenge and escape the room.

Will you be able to outsmart Houdini and escape his legendary escape room? There's only one way to find out!

practicalInfo.en:
Welcome to Stauning Whisky, the distillery that defies expectations. As soon as you step inside, you'll be struck by the modern Danish design and the rustic splendor of the past. Our distillery is truly one-of-a-kind, boasting 24 copper pot stills that are unlike anything you've ever seen before.

Join us for our Tour of Stauning Whisky, where you'll get to go behind the scenes and see how we transform locally grown cereal into some of the world's finest whisky. Our guided tour takes you through the entire process, from the mash tun to the fermentation tanks all the way to the final product. Along the way, you'll learn about the history of Stauning and how our distillery stands out from the rest. And of course, no tour of Stauning Whisky would be complete without a tasting of our award-winning whisky. Whether you're a whisky enthusiast or a first-time drinker, our tour is family-friendly and promises an experience that's both fascinating and memorable.
